name: Cardsmas Tiles
description:
Christmas spirit is at an all-time low! Santa has given his magical hat to a group of Christmas heroes, and they must raise Christmas spirit!

PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Core Gameplay Information- 

  • Heroes will generate cards (Click the button next to them to draw)
  • Click and drag cards onto the board for different effects
  • Different tiles will have different effects on Christmas spirit
  • Right click to pause
  • Click the head of a hero to give them Santa's hat
  • Santa's hat will make a hero generate cards faster

Extra Details -

Each hero can create one of several common cards when the draw bar is either green or purple. If the bar is fully charged (gold), the hero will instead give a legendary card.
